---
name: Pull Request
about: Provide a structured checklist for your contribution
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

Thank you for your contribution!

Please complete the checklist below and delete any lines that are not applicable.

* [ ] I have read `CONTRIBUTING.md` and followed the contribution process.
* [ ] I have added or updated data following the schema in `data/schema/`.
* [ ] I have run the validation scripts in `scripts/validate_data/` without errors.
* [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` with a description of this change.
* [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `docs/`.
* [ ] My pull request references an open issue (if applicable).
* [ ] I have not committed any proprietary or personal data.
